name: The Man and The Sea
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #48.

 A plataform old Style game with some manegement resources features.

--= UPDATE V6c =--

- Bubbles.

- Reduce level size;

- Store now show item limit max;

- StartChest Bug Fix;

--= UPDATE V5b =--

- Chests bug fix;

- BlockRock fix;

--= UPDATE V5 =--

- Now the game has a GameEnd and no longer a infinity runner! 

Enjoy!!
